DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , case-only , study measure impact MMprofiler treatment intention decision active Multiple Myeloma patient .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , case-only , study measure impact MMprofiler treatment intention decision active MM patient . Eligible patient tumor sample analyze prognostic MMprofiler SKY92 , several cytogenetic marker , gene expression marker , gene expression cluster . A total 250 patient enrol 7 US center . Patients follow 5 year diagnosis .
DOC.criteria: Potentially active active multiple myeloma accord IMWG criterion Candidates systemic treatment ECOG Performance Status > 3 Tumor sample fail QA QC criterion MMprofiler
